duties_responsibilities.duty: Leads cross functional, company-wide, and business unit specific process improvement initiatives.
Conducts organizational and business process analysis in partnership with business unit owners and process owners.
Designs and drives project plans with senior leaders to attain improvements as identified.
Creates and compiles performance tracking metrics and data tracking for business units and associated services.
Equips the organization with operational excellence tools and practices.
Leads high impact process improvement projects by partnering with senior leaders.
Validates and scopes improvement projects, links client requirements and business process improvements.
Enables the delivery of budgeted benefits at the program level.
Integrates and interprets data from diverse sources to find solutions for very complex problems.
Monitors and controls the changes made to improve processes to ensure long term adoption.
Works closely with Business partners and is trusted administrator to help bring innovation and insight.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree - Preferred4 years of experience in Hands-on experience driving Lean implementation.1 year of experience in Six Sigma, or the equivalent combination of education and experience. LSS- Greenbelt - Required LSS-Blackbelt - Preferred
